Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system.'' Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said,`` While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward. release his blues album on April 11 but because the marriage of Prince William and Kate Middleton takes place just weeks after he's holding back the release. According to UK Newspaper Daily Express, he said: It was going to be released at the end of April but it collided with a royal wedding. We don't want to bump them off the front page so we'll push it later.
